title: Tupperware's Goings: 92% of Business Is Outside the U.S.(Audio)
itunes:title: Tupperware's Goings: 92% of Business Is Outside the U.S.(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Rick Goings, Chairman and CEO of Tupperware Brands, on the company's robust Q2 earnings driven by international sales, and strategies going forward.
